description: React component for the Signup page, providing UI and logic for user registration in a frontend web application.

methods.name: Signup()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the signup form and handling user registration.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input change events, updating form state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls signup function, and navigates upon success.
